title: State provider commit issue in NDM
body:
2019-08-08 07:51:14.4113|Confirming a deposit with id: '0xa74fb5f299fe6e4b8a629a91ed55e0dd37ce9192f627b003231d148f479b64ba' has failed.|System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.Commit(IReleaseSpec releaseSpec, IStateTracer stateTracer) in /root/repo_ndm/ndm/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 379
   at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessor.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer, Boolean readOnly) in /root/repo_ndm/ndm/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/TransactionProcessor.cs:line 152
   at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessor.CallAndRestore(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer) in /root/repo_ndm/ndm/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/TransactionProcessor.cs:line 56
   at Nethermind.Facade.BlockchainBridge.Call(BlockHeader blockHeader, Transaction transaction) in /root/repo_ndm/ndm/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Facade/BlockchainBridge.cs:line 186
